name: 陳潔晞
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
1. 9/16 Introduction
2. 9/23 The Basic Structure of a Sentence
3. 9/30 Tense & Viewpoint
4. 10/7 Tone
5. 10/14 Counterfactual Sentences
6. 10/21 Complicated Sentences
7. 10/28  Complicated Sentences
8. 11/4 Review
9. 11/11 Test
10. 11/18  Composition: Taking Examples
11. 11/25  Composition: Comparison and Contrast
12. 12/2  Composition: Classification
13. 12/9  Composition: Process
14. 12/16  Composition: Description
15. 12/23  Composition: Argument
16. 12/30 Review
17. 1/6 Test
